snippet: Trisha Brown Dance Company, which is winding down, is expected to announce on Tuesday that it has raised $2.5 million toward keeping Ms. Brown’s work in the public eye.
abstract: Trisha Brown Dance Company is expected to announce that it has raised $2.5 million toward keeping Brown’s work in public eye; company, nearing halfway point of three-year farewell tour, is trying to raise $5 million to preserve legacy through educational initiatives and occasional performances.
lead_paragraph: Trisha Brown Dance Company, which is winding down, is expected to announce on Tuesday that it has raised $2.5 million toward keeping Ms. Brown’s work in the public eye.

headline.main: Trisha Brown Dance Attains Half of Fund-Raising Goal
headline.print_headline: Trisha Brown Dance Attains Half of Fund-Raising Goal
